title: chat disconnect
body: the chat is dead and disconnected is there an issue or something that isn't currently reported in status?

replies.body:
We're looking into the ongoing issues with the chat service going on at the moment. Updates will be posted [here](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na).

Let me know if you have any other concerns.
I'm experiencing the same problem. Hopefully Riot will have a fix within a couple of hours.
